tool.name: Run OrthoMCL
tool.description: to find orthologs using reciprocal BLAST and HMM clustering

param.name: limiter
param.label: Core set of orthologous genes limiter
param.help: Nucleotide fasta file containing coding regions in individual records. This file will be translated to protein and fed into orthomcl along with files in the translated gene proteins zip archive to influence the clustering of orthologs and (optionally) later the extraction of orthologs. Please note that you will have to enable this last step separately!

param.name: proteinlength
param.label: Minimum protein length
param.help: Proteins shorter than this length will be considers poor proteins and filtered out by OrthoMCL.

tool.help: This tool runs OrthoMCL and returns the orthologous groups file.
